p: For CoSi, the bulk electronic spectrum and Fermi arcs were observed in ARPES experiments in Refs. [ 14, 15, 16]. The experimental bulk band structure and Fermi arcs correlate quite well with the results of first-principle calculations [ 4, 5, 6].
